resources.string:
FullStack-Quiz - Release 1 


 This game uses the following sounds from freesound: 

 Video Game 7.wav by djgriffin 
 https://freesound.org/people/djgriffin 

 User Interface Clicks and Buttons 1.wav by original_sound 
 https://freesound.org/people/original_sound 

 Correct Choice by unadamlar 
 https://freesound.org/people/unadamlar 

 Wrong Choice by unadamlar 
 https://freesound.org/people/unadamlar 


 The code for this project is freely viewable at: 
 https://github.com/FI-Aquacrest/FullStack-Quiz
